0.0.2-0.name: @heroku/ember-slds-components
0.0.2-0.description: The default blueprint for ember-cli addons.

scripts.prebuild-storybook: yarn build && shx cp -r public/* dist

0.0.2-0.readme:
ember-slds-components
==============================================================================

Ember JS implementations of components from the [Lightning Design System](https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/)


Compatibility
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

* Ember.js v3.4 or above
* Ember CLI v2.13 or above
* Node.js v8 or above


Development
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To spin up Storybook, run
```bash
yarn storybook:dev
```
Note that this will spin up the Ember server in a background process, and then Storybook in the foreground.

Installation
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

```
ember install ember-slds-components
```


Contributing
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

See the [Contributing](CONTRIBUTING.md) guide for details.


License
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This project is licensed under the [MIT License](LICENSE.md).
